entry.title: Sharing an Immersive Space on the Apple Vision Pro

link.title: Sharing an Immersive Space on the Apple Vision Pro

entry.title: Talk at CocoaHead SF
entry.content:
At CocoaHead SF, I will be presenting how to join together the immersive space of multiple Apple Vision Pro Devices. If we both wear our AVPs in the same room, we should be able to share the augmented magic.

links: https://www.meetup.com/swift-language/events/300506240/
entry.summary: At CocoaHead SF, I will be presenting how to join together the immersive space of multiple Apple Vision Pro Devices.
